```{r}
data <- read_csv("steam_games.csv")

data <- data %>%
  arrange(desc(hours))

data

min <- sum(data$hours) * .01

data %>%
  filter(hours > min) %>%
  ggplot(aes(
    y = reorder(name, hours),
    x = hours,
    fill = name
  )) +
  geom_col()
```
